title: Knowledge and Attitude of Saudi Primary Teachers Towards Students with Attention-Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD) in Albaha Region
abstract: Background: Attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) is among the most frequent psychiatric disorder in children, and it has a detrimental impact on the childâ€™s social, familial, and familial functioning. Teachers are frequently the first to suspect attention ADHD in their students since they are with them for the most of the day and are familiar with how normal students behave in the classroom.
